name: Learning OpenTok Node.js
description: An OpenTok sample app for handling OpenTok server-side functionality on a Node.js server

VONAGE_APP_ID.description: Vonage Application Id: Login to the Vonage Dashboard (https://dashboard.nexmo.com/applications) to get this value

VONAGE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Vonage Private Key as a string or the path to the file: Login to the Vonage Dashboard (https://dashboard.nexmo.com/applications) to get this value

VONAGE_PRIVATE_KEY64.description: OR Vonage Private Key as a base64-encoded value: Login to the Vonage Dashboard (https://dashboard.nexmo.com/applications) to get this value
